page.title: 14FISHBURN AMBULANCE DEPOT.
page.content: ONE OF DURHAM COUNTY'S {AMBULANCE {DEPOTS}IS SITUATED IN OUR BLOCK.IT USED TO BE AT{SEDGEFIELD GENERAL {HOSPITAL,}NEARBY,UNTIL THAT CLOSED DOWN.THE DEPOT HAS{16}AMBULANCE MEN LOOKING AFTER{8}AMBULANCES.THERE ARE ALSO MECHANICS AND OFFICE WORKERS.A { {STATION OFFICER}IS IN CHARGE.THE AMBULANCES CAN BE CALLED TO ANYWHERE IN THE COUNTY AND GO TO HOSPITALS IN {DURHAM,HARTLEPOOL,TEESSIDE AND {CLEVELAND.}THE AMBULANCES ARE SENT TO{ {FIRES,ACCIDENTS,OTHER EMERGENCIES}AND THEY ALSO TAKE PEOPLE TO{HOSPITAL {APPOINTMENTS.}WHEN THE MEN ARE NOT OUT {ON CALL}THERE ARE MANY THINGS TO DO.THEY HAVE TO CHECK THE AMBULANCES AND EQUIPMENT AND KEEP THE VEHICLES CLEAN.THERE IS A{RESTROOM}WHERE THE MEN CAN{COOK,READ}OR{RELAX}AND WATCH {TELEVISION.}THEY HAVE A VERY BUSY AND {IMPORTANT}JOB TO DO.
